price: 54.Nabii Ibraahim qajjibsitak : idoolanni yoo kee yi barra inkih geek lakalaa isin baxal yoo aytikumussaanam ?Ah anninnah tan aytikumaay yoh abtaanam keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla abashartumūnī ʿalā an massaniya al-kibaru fabima tubashirūna
translations: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings
